Title: Two Brothers
Overview: Two tigers are separated as cubs and taken into captivity, only to be reunited years later as enemies by an explorer (Pearce) who inadvertently forces them to fight each other.
Tagline: Two infant tiger cubs, separated from their parents and each other.
production_companies: Pathé Renn Productions, TF1 Films Production, Canal+, Pathe, Two Brothers Productions
Cast: Maï Anh Le, Guy Pearce, Oanh Nguyen
clean_text: two brother two tiger separate cub take captivity reunite year later enemy explorer pearce inadvertently force fight two infant tiger cub separate parent adventure drama family jeanjacque annaud maï anh le guy pearce oanh nguyen 2004
